# edgecenter_rmon_status_page (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "edgecenter" {
  permanent_api_token = "251$d3361.............1b35f26d8"
}

resource "edgecenter_rmon_status_page" "example" {
  name = "Example Status"
  slug = "example-status"

  checks {
    check_id = 12345
  }
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `checks` (Block List, Min: 1) List of checks associated with the status page. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--checks))
- `name` (String) The name of the status page.
- `slug` (String) The slug of the status page.

### Optional

- `custom_style` (String) Custom CSS style for the status page.
- `description` (String) The description of the status page.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedblock--checks"></a>
### Nested Schema for `checks`

Required:

- `check_id` (Number) Check ID.
